text:
[Verse]
Drops are falling on my face
Twirl and spin to life's embrace
Feel the rhythm feel the beat
Dancing wild on every street

[Verse 2]
Shoes are soaked but I don't care
Joyful hearts are everywhere
Clapping hands and happy cheers
Wave goodbye to all your fears

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Holding hands it feels so right
Jumping in the puddles free
Come along and dance with me

[Verse 3]
Stars are shining up above
Raindrops fall like our sweet love
Music plays within our souls
Let it take you make you whole

[Bridge]
Night is young the world is ours
We will dance for endless hours
Footsteps splash on glistening ground
Lost together we have found

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Holding hands it feels so right
Jumping in the puddles free
Come along and dance with me
title: Dancing in the Rain
